summary: This document appears to be a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) statistical overview dated March 31, 2019, providing data on inmate population, offense categories, security levels, institutions, staff, and budget. It is part of a larger file series (EFTA00142694-EFTA00142816) and contains no specific information about Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or his case.
keyFacts: The document is a BOP statistical report dated March 31, 2019.
It shows the total federal inmate population was 180,082 at that time.
Sex offenses accounted for 10% of the federal inmate population.
The BOP operated 122 institutions and had a staff of 35,134.
The document contains no direct references to Jeffrey Epstein, his crimes, associates, or victims.
